entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 9:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
